za.ac.salt.pipt.common.dataExchange
Interface AllowingPropertyChanges

All Known Subinterfaces:
PiptData
All Known Implementing Classes:
ABReference, AirGlowSpectrum, Blackbody, EmissionLine, ETCSpectrumPlotPanel, ExposureConfig, GenericProperties, GenericSpectrum, GridSpectrum, KC96GalaxyTemplate, KuruczModel, LunarProperties, NormalizedKC96GalaxyTemplate, NormalizedKuruczModel, ODI, PiptDataLeaf, PowerLaw, SkySpectrum, SolarProperties, SolarSpectrum, TargetSpectrum, TelescopeProperties, UserSuppliedSpectrum, VNormalizedBlackbody, VNormalizedPowerLaw, VNormalizedUserSuppliedSpectrum
public interface AllowingPropertyChanges

This interface provides the methods for adding and removing property change listeners.

Method Summary
 void addPropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
          Adds the given listener to the list of property change listeners.
 void removePropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
          Removes the given listener from the list of property change listeners.
 

Method Detail

Adds the given listener to the list of property change listeners.

Parameters:
listener - the property change listenert to be added

removePropertyChangeListener

void removePropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
Removes the given listener from the list of property change listeners.

Parameters:
listener - the property change listener to be removed
